title: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format displayed in the dynamic text item and data/text item is different.
OB: The datetime values retrieved from the table appear with different formats in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
EB: The datetime values retrieved from the table should have consistent formats in both the dynamic text item and data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 

1. Insert a text, data, and dynamic text item in a table. 
2. Retrieve datetime values from the table and observe the format in the dynamic text item and data/text item.
